title: 687. Influence of Baseball Analytics, First Look at Jaguars Minicamp & Thoughts on Possible CFP Expansion
itunes:title: 687. Influence of Baseball Analytics, First Look at Jaguars Minicamp & Thoughts on Possible CFP Expansion
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode of Move the Sticks. To start off, the duo discuss the influence of analytics in baseball and its impact on scouting in other sports like football (:58). Then, the guys look at what teams or players have done to gain a competitive advantage over the years (13:16). Next, DJ and Bucky give their thoughts on the College Football Playoff considering an expansion to 12 teams (25:15). To wrap up the show, Bucky joins from the Jacksonville Jaguars' mandatory minicamp, where he talks about what's happening this week (34:36). Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
